U

update() - Method in class Component
This method declaration, given that this is an abstract class, requires each component inheriting from this class to implement an update method, which in principle will be unique to that type of component (called to determine how turrets fire weapons, how shields shield, how engines thrust etc).
update() - Method in class Entity
The update method of this entity, currently all it does is call the move() method, and if the entity is not a player or a projectile, attempts to shoot (because this makes the assumption that the only other entities other than projectiles and player ships are enemy ships).
update() - Method in interface EntitySuiteInterface
Moves this entity, and updates hardpoints attached to it
update() - Method in class HardPoint
This method completely updates both the position of this hardpoint and the position of the component attached to this hardpoint, so that the component update() method does not have to worry about updating its position.
update() - Method in class ShipTurret
 
update(long) - Method in class Sprite
 
update() - Method in class StatBar
This method updates the stat bar.
